text: ninnal kanunna tanneannumillate akasannale uyarttinirttiyavan allahuvan. pinne avan sinhasanasthanayi. avan surya candranmare adhinappetuttiyirikkunnu. ellam niscita kalaparidhiyil cariccukeantirikkukayan. avan karyannalellam niyantriccukeantirikkunnu. i telivukalellam vivariccutarikayum ceyyunnu. ninnalute nathanumayi sandhikkunnatine sambandhicc ninnal drdhabeadhyamullavarakan
